response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense significance for me. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exceptional item not only represents a substantial investment but also carries a rich history and potential for future growth in value. I believe it would be a wise addition to your collection or portfolio. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable piece with someone who appreciates its true worth.", "product_price": 750000}
